title: 06/02/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/02/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
As a huge fan of LeBron James, Colin admits something about the 4x champion and what we can expect from him at this point in his career. Big news out of the NBA with the Celtics moving head coach Brad Stevens into the front office and letting go of Danny Ainge and why we shouldn’t be so negative about his time in Boston. He also defends LeBron for leaving the bench early during a blowout loss in game 5 against the Suns. Plus, NBA insider Chris Mannix joins the show to tell Colin what's next for the Celtics and Ainge after the massive overhaul.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
